categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic fleets

nodes.text: Task Force Antilles was a Rebel Alliance task force in the Alliance Fleet that consisted of at least three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes. It was in operation during the Imperial Era and at one point came under laser fire while located near an asteroid field, with at least two corvettes carrying cargo.
Task Force Antilles was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the 2017 Hammerhead Corvettes Expansion Pack for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Armada miniatures game.
